task.title: Thread the Ribbon
task.shortdesc: When you are changing the ribbon of your typewriter, you will need to thread the ribbon.

taskbody.prereq: Prior to threading the ribbon, your ribbon spools need to be in place.

step.cmd: Take the ribbon between each spool and feed it through the small slots on each side of the ribbon guide, taking care to not stretch the ribbon.
Gently rotate each ribbon spool so that the ribbon is taut, but not tightened too much.
